properties.entry: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, R.* FROM (SELECT REVIEW_NO , PRODUCT_NAME , REVIEW_IMAGE , POINT , ORDER_SUM , PRODUCT_IMG , PRODUCT_BUY_QUANTITY , PRODUCT_INVENTORY_QUANTITY , OPTION_NAME , OPTION_BUY_QUANTITY , OPTION_INVENTORY_QUANTITY FROM REVIEW_INFORMATION WHERE REVIEW_NO IS NOT NULL ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC) R) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
